text: This is a list of all transactions occurring in the 1981-82 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 2, 1981 to June 30, 1982), see the links below ==External links== *Basketball.RealGM.com *Basketball-Reference.com ==References== Transactions 1981-82
title: List of 1981–82 NBA season transactions
